description: Queries a list of distinct accounting types.
availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: Get the accounting type for the subuser specified here
The minimal creation date of accountings which will be taken into consideration
The maximal creation date of accountings which will be taken into consideration
Index of the first entry to be returned
Max. number of entries to be returned. The system has a default value for performance purposes
Depth of the list, may be SELF or SUBUSER
Get all accounting types of a certain invoice
Only takes accountings with a description stated here into consideration
Only takes accountings with a reference stated here into consideration
